name: Feed Me More
description:
A short game about taking care of our little grub.  There is different ending based on how well you do.  Please do your best.


Must use Chrome or Firefox to play. Safari does not properly support WebGL.
Update: Fixed a bug where the player could wrongfully be penalized.
Er, never mind that, it's not game break and the change has been rolled back. Good luck, lol.
